level_rune_09-01.name: Foothill Hui-ch'i
level_rune_09-01.description:
Dusk has departed Mount Hui-ch'i, yet the creatures born from her brushstrokes still remain, and it may take a bit of work to get this thick ink to fade.
<@lv.item><Mark of Hui and Ming></> Operators deployed on it will earn a Hui-Ming attribute
<@lv.item><Mark of Dusk and Dawn></> On first passing through, enemies will change attribute
<@lv.item><Two-Step Firecracker mk2></> Deals Arts damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles, changing Hui-Ming attributes within its range

global_forbidloc_1.description: 6 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

enemy_xi_1.description: All <'Free'> have +20% HP, +20% ATK, +60% DEF, and +15 RES

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

global_pcharnum_1.description: Deployed Unit Limit is reduced to 7

enemy_spmage_2.description: All <'Envy'> have +90% HP, +50% ATK, and has Charged Attacks cooldown reduced by 70%

char_cost_attackers_2.description: The DP Cost of Sniper, Guard, and Caster Operators is doubled, and their Redeployment Time is increased by 50%

char_cost_supporters_2.description: The DP Cost of Medic, Defender, and Supporter Operators is doubled, and their Redeployment Time is increased by 50%

char_hp_2.description: All friendly units have -35% Max HP

global_costrecovery_2.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 50%

enemy_spslme_bmod_2.description: All <'Smarty'> have +110% HP, +50% ATK, and +30 RES

enemy_xi_amod_2.description: All <'Free'> have +30% HP, +150% DEF, +20 RES; 'Break the Chains' has cooldown reduced by 30% and AoE expanded by 50%

enemy_xi_bmod_2.description: All <'Free'> have +90% HP, +70% ATK, +15 RES, and can use 'Weft and Warp'

global_squadnum_2.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 6 Operators

global_pcharnum_2.description: Deployed Unit Limit is reduced to 5

enemy_xi_amod_3.description: All <'Free'> have +50% HP, +250% DEF, +30 RES; 'Break the Chains' has cooldown reduced by 50% and AoE expanded by 100%

enemy_xi_bmod_3.description: All <'Free'> have +200% HP, +150% ATK, +15 RES, +300% Attack Range, can use 'Weft and Warp', and the cooldown reduced by 60%

global_inverter_1.description: The number of available Two-Step Firecracker mk2 is reduced to 1

char_cost_attackers_1.description: The DP Cost of Sniper and Caster Operators is doubled

char_cost_supporters_1.description: The DP Cost of Defender and Supporter Operators is doubled

global_costrecovery_3.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 75%

enemy_spslme_amod_3.description: All <'Smarty'> have +300% HP, +50 RES, and begin with flipped Hui and Ming attribute

enemy_spslme_bmod_3.description: All <'Smarty'> have +110% HP, +110% ATK, +30 RES, and are invisible
